stanza.line: Love is too young to know what conscience isis
Yet who knows not conscience is born of lovelove
Then gentle cheater urge not my amissamiss
Lest guilty of my faults thy sweet self proveprove
For thou betraying me I do betraybetray
My nobler part to my gross body treasontreason
My soul doth tell my body that he maymay
Triumph in love flesh stays no farther reasonreason
But rising at thy name doth point out theethee
As his triumphant prize proud of this pridepride
He is contented thy poor drudge to bebe
To stand in thy affairs fall by thy sideside
No want of conscience hold it that I callcall
Her love for whose dear love I rise and fallfall
